title: the 'cant believe' im asking gd thread
body:
ok, so im back to play some games after awhile away, but i come back to a different game, not saying thats a bad thing stuff was getting stale.

but damnit, they went and ruined darius, his Q is terrible now, no as slow on w, just nevermind, as of right now the only 2 assassin/bruisers i see left not 'reksai'd' are mantheon and wukong, even my fiora "even if shes better now i had her down before" is ruined to me.

so whos a better pick right now, pantheon or wukong? i think wukong has always and will always be strong, but in leaning to mantheon, even if he does fall off later, guess i could just start building him more tankier?

replies.body:
i dont know man, i ever only lost to 1 riven as darius is all the games ive picked him top, i last to a riven last weekend, granted i hadent played in forever, but i just cant stand that new q, im sure if its relearned its better, but as it is now, riven just does what riven does to everybody else thats not pantheon now, she just stuns and knocks up wit haa's inbetween with passive and takes the lane. Q_Q.

guess its time for some OK rammus top :D

also il say this about fiora and darius reworks imo, fiora was totally OP, not just because of her ult though, it was her E, so much free attackspeed resetting on kills and assists, in the right hands she was broken, fact..

darius, no so much, he had an overloaded 'nooblord' kit, and was my goto haha this kid picked riven champion, other than that, he was awful, because he was what we thought he was, a straight huge, stand toe to toe with rivens, and fight to the death, but i learned to itemize for movement speed, ms quints, faster boots, ms masteries, etc, but now his Q 'his bread and butter' is just soo bad, i dont have the time or will to figure out the new timing, and he can just b cc'ed now anyways during it, not saying counter play isint a good thing.

i like his new passive he gets armor penn anyways so its better to have ad > ap dmg on it, his new ult sucks until lvl3, his e is worse with that so called bug fix, and his w is mehhhh, i thought we all agreed before that with no gap closer and terrible movement speed and how bad he got kited he was fine where he was at? oh well...rip woad king.
Bro, I'm serious, Darius is stronk. He and all the other juggernauts had to get nerfed after their reworks because they were flexing too hard and making everyone else feel bad about their GAINS.

Actually Darius is still pretty strong right now. It takes some time to get used to the rework, but I suggest you work through the adjustment period if you played him a lot before.

That said, I personally favor Wukong over Pantheon because of his value as an initiator.

> [{quoted}](name=IronwallJackson,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=uIUZNJdK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-26T19:33:41.213+0000)
>
> Actually Darius is still pretty strong right now. It takes some time to get used to the rework, but I suggest you work through the adjustment period if you played him a lot before.
> 
> That said, I personally favor Wukong over Pantheon because of his value as an initiator.

thanks for youre reply, and i agree wukong is a way better teamfighter than pantheon, he has his w so he can get out after he goes in 'sometimes' and his ult is just really strong on the back line, but i feel like pantheon is the better lane bully, has very few counters, and snowballs more matchups faster/easier, im talking top/mid here, not jungle and only support vs a vayne not backed by say a nami, lulu, or morgana.

all this aside, wukong does much better at later stages in the same than pantheon, who if not built tankier, will fall off hard past 35+ minutes vs any decent team comp.

thanks for youre input.
